FuncDef: The ipv4-family unicast command displays the BGP-IPv4 unicast address family. The ipv4-family unicast command displays the BGP-IPv4 unicast address family. By default, the BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view is displayed.
ExtraInfo: Before performing BGP configurations in an IPv4 address family, you need to run the ipv4-family command in the BGP view to enable the IPv4 address family and enter the address family view. By default, BGP uses the IPv4 unicast address family.
